column5: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A man was taken to Calmette Hospital after jumping from the fifth floor in a suicide bid.------The shocking incident occurred at 9:00pm on Sunday
column7: 2018 near the hotel on Monivong Boulevard in Monorom district
column9: Phnom Penh.------The victim was not yet identified
column10: but it is thought he is a 19 year old from Takeo who had argued with his girlfriend.------A source told the TNN agency that before the incident
column11: he and the man had sat down together with other friends drinking. The victim went to the house and jumped out of the fifth floor. A tree in the street below broke his fall
column12: and although the victim was still alive
column13: he was seriously injured. Shocked residents reported the incident to the police.------Another source told TNN that a few minutes later
column14: relatives of the victim’s family came to the scene
column15: crying loudly. One of them was the man’s girlfriend
column16: who sat down and hugged the man
column17: and didn’t answer journalists questions.------An ambulance from Calmette hospital arrived and took the man to hospital.------The authorities demanded that a men drinking with the victim and his girlfriend help clarify the incident at the station.------http://tnn-news.com/archives/126152------More pics: ------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%88%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9B%E1%9F%84%E1%9F%87%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%82%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%B6%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%B6%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%98%E1%9E%BD%E1%9E%99%E1%9E%82%E1%9E%BC%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%8A/------ ------ ------
